title: How to change a song in a ranked match?
body:
Yo guys, how the heck do I change the soundtrack while I'm searching for a match or during champ selection? I read Riot changed the directory, but I still don't understand what mp3 should I change.
 The new directory is: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.230\deploy\mod\tbd\assets\audio.
Right?

replies.body: Changing tunes or making playlists is not something that's currently featured, so I wouldn't recommend this.  Changing the files around are likely to cause problems or even game crashes.  If you don't want to hear the music already provided, you can toggle it off through the client as well as in-game options.  Hope that helps!
